disclaimer.title: Welcome!
disclaimer.text:
Hello 👋

Welcome to the second version of 🥃 game. I hope you will enjoy it even more then before 😍 However, be 😎 and do not 🔍 other's games 😈
This website likes 🍪, deal with it 😏 Don't forget to 🍺 responsibly and think about your moms 👩
Cheers 🍻!
